title: Abyss Bronze - Gold Only Tounament
body:
**Hello!**
As the tournament start date gets closer, I figured I would give everyone a reminder about our upcoming Bronze-Gold only tournament. Abyss Esports is hosting the tournament in the hopes of giving the lower elo a fun and fair chance to compete. All the details you need are below but if you have any questions then please add 'Abyss Nathan' in the league client.

As a bonus, we will be giving every player a chance to receive some one on one coaching with a challenger player! So make sure to sign up.

sign up form: http://goo.gl/forms/9F2YvVag1H

**THE TOURNAMENT FACTS**
-Starts 4th October 2015 @ 12pm AEST. Teams must be ready to go at 11:15am AEST
-The tournament is a single day event and should end around 7pm AEST
-Top 8 teams will receive prizes
-Double Elimination Bracket can be found here: http://challonge.com/AbyssB2G
-Join the ‘Abyss Esports’ in game chat room on the day of the tournament to submit results
-Please use the following link to update your roster: http://goo.gl/forms/2yG7diF4TD

**PRIZES**
1st Place: 2700 RP, Ryze, Triumphant Ryze, 4-Win IP Boost Per Player
2nd Place: 1720 RP, 4-Win IP Boost Per Player
3rd Place: 1300 RP, 4-Win IP Boost Per Player
4th Place: 400 RP, 4-Win IP Boost Per Player
5th-8th Place: 4-Win IP Boost Per Player

**RULES**
-Players may switch between substitutes between games but are locked into using a player once the match has started
-Players are free to switch roles at any time during the Tournament.
-Players must be Bronze, Silver or Gold in soloQ with at least 25 games played or else they are not eligible to play. This includes Unranked. 
-Team captains must alert an admin ASAP if any player changes their IGN
-Check in opens at 11am AEST and closes at 11:45am. Teams must be checked in or they miss out

**COMBATING SMURFING**
Being worried about Smurfs is a legitimate concern that everyone has a right to have. Our aim at Abyss Esports is to help improve the esports community by interacting with the lower player base to promote healthy game play.
We understand that we might not be able to catch every single smurf but we are confident our system can detect 95% of them. Here are some of the things we are doing to help prevent smurfs. Some of our main ways of detection cannot be revealed for security purposes.

-Double Elimination: If teams are unlucky and run into smurfs in the early rounds of the tournament, they are knocked down into a second bracket to make sure they still have a chance at winning the main prize
-Prizes: The prizes are only awarded to the players in the team and cannot be transferred to another account
-Spectate: We will have admins spectating as many matches as possible to pay attention to anyone raising red flags on our system

Good luck and dont forget to check us out on facebook! www.facebook.com/AbyssEsportsOCE
